cab.content: srty of/emment.)ISOBATTLE SITUATION - EVENING - 29th OCTOBER, 1918.WSSTEHl-T FRONT.The day has "been very quiet on the whole of theWestern front,ITALIAN FRONT.The battle on the PIAVE front is going well for theAllies, The enemy in the plains shows signs of retirementand Ms men are surrendering very freely.BALKAN AND PALESTINE FRONTS,There is nothing to report.General Staff,War Office, S.W.I. .29th October, 1918,Issued at 6t2o p,m,
